queries.variant: fey creature that is tiny, can poison water, and goes invisible

queries.variant: water creature that is stealthy, has high dexterity and an aura that poisons

queries.variant: tiny monster that is cunning, can cast spells, and controls water

queries.variant: creature that is chaotic evil, speaks Aquan, and rules in water environments

queries.variant: monster that has darkvision, is immune to poison, and resides in water
